entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Releases - 2025-04-08
entry.content:
.NET 8.0.15

Release

.NET 9.0.4

Release

What's Changed

  • [Backport to 8.0.1xx] Workflows: Don't allow merge if pr in lockdown (#46663) by @edvilme in #46695
